Description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu plots next moves as defence minister Avigdor Lieberman resigns unhappy over ceasefire in blockaded Gaza, leaving Netanyahu clinging to a one-seat majority in parliament.

Headline: Israel's Netanyahu takes over defence job as coalition falters
Description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will take over the defence portfolio, a spokesman for his Likud Party says, sparking speculation of an early election.

Headline: Thousands attend Hamas rally near Gaza border with Israel
Description: Hamas and Israel have fought a cross-border battle of rocket attacks and air strikes, triggered by a botched Israeli undercover raid in Gaza on November 11, ending an Egyptian-brokered ceasefire.

Headline: Israel narrowly avoids snap election after minister's U-turn
Description: A key coalition partner in Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's government said that he would not withdraw his party, keeping the coalition intact despite a crisis triggered by a violent flare-up with Gaza militants.

Headline: Airbnb to remove illegal Israeli settlement listings in occupied West Bank
Description: The decision by home-rental company Airbnb, affecting some 200 listings, has been welcomed by Palestinians as a step towards peace while drawing condemnation from Israeli officials.

Headline: Israel to expand illegal settlements in occupied East Jerusalem
Description: Israeli Parliament approves legislation allowing further expansion of illegal Jewish-only settlement in the occupied city's Silwan neighbourhood.

Headline: How does the religious settler movement influence Israeli politics?
Description: The settlers who are building homes in the occupied West Bank say they are not just fulfilling a biblical prophecy but are building one of the most enduring political movements in Israel.

Headline: Israel demolishes shops in Palestinian refugee camp
Description: Jerusalem municipality orders demolition of shops on pretext they were built without permits. Palestinians say Israeli authorities rarely give permission to build businesses in occupied Jerusalem's Shuafat refugee camp.

Headline: Israeli minister says Trump peace plan a 'waste of time'
Description: Israel's Justice Minister Ayelet Shaked says that reaching peace is currently impossible and that Trump should focus his energy elsewhere until the Palestinians are ready to compromise.
